name: Karie Terhark
what_you_do: Karie is a Certified ToP® Facilitator and Mentor Trainer with extensive experience in strategic planning and community engagement. Her passion is fostering collaboration and driving positive change.
who_you_serve: Organizations and communities seeking to achieve their goals through effective facilitation and inclusive decision-making processes.
offering: Facilitation services, facilitation training, youth leadership development, and mentoring for facilitators.
social_proof: Certified ToP® Facilitator and Mentor Trainer
signature_programs: ToP Facilitation Methods, ToP Strategic Planning, Approaches to Environmental Scanning, Accelerated Action Planning
business_focus: Helping organizations and communities achieve their goals through effective facilitation and inclusive decision-making processes.
service_provided: facilitation services, facilitation training, youth leadership development, mentoring
